Package bankteller.demo1

Class Checking

java.lang.Object
bankteller.demo1.Account
bankteller.demo1.Checking
Direct Known Subclasses:
CollegeChecking
public class Checking extends Account
This class represents an open or closed Checking account with an account holder and current balance.
Author:
Afsana Rahman, Mini Sinha

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Method that converts current account information into a String. String is returned in format "accountType::FirstName LastName mm/dd/yyy::Balance $#,##0.00". If account is closed, returned String will end in "::CLOSED".
      Overrides:
      toString in class Account
      Returns:
      String containing account information

    • monthlyInterest

      public double monthlyInterest()
      Method that returns the percentage of the monthly interest on current account. Annual interest on checking accounts is 0.1%.
      Specified by:
      monthlyInterest in class Account
      Returns:
      percent monthly interest in decimal form (fraction out of 100)

    • fee

      public double fee()
      Method that returns the monthly fee on current account. Monthly fee is waived if current balance is greater than $1000. Otherwise, an account is charged $25/month.
      Specified by:
      fee in class Account
      Returns:
      monthly fee for current account

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Method that returns the account type of the current account.
      Specified by:
      getType in class Account
      Returns:
      "Checking"
